text.section:
In this section, "individual surety" means a person that:
issues surety bonds or contracts of surety insurance; and
does not have a certificate of authority issued by the Commissioner.

It is a fraudulent insurance act for an individual surety to solicit or issue a surety bond or contract of surety insurance except as provided in:
§§ 13-207 and 17-104 of the State Finance and Procurement Article; and
for an uncompensated person, §§ 5-203 and 5-204 of the Criminal Procedure Article.
